web_snippets: Holly Smithson is President & CEO of Athena, a woman's global advocacy organization that fast tracks women in STEM through its portfolio of leadership programs.
Holly Smithson, CEO of Athena, empowers global STEM companies to develop female leaders and male allies while advocating for gender equality.
Holly Smithson is Athena's Chief Executive Officer. Athena is empowering progress together by advancing professional women in the STEM economy.
